content: can we think about thanksgiving without a turkey of course not and here is the latest fall pattern - the thanksgiving turkey gnome > free patter is on the blog click here 1 crochet a unique home decoration for this thanksgiving holiday with this easy crochet gnome pattern in the pdf we included detailed photos with step-by-step written instructions to help you through the pattern ******* this listing is for the digital pdf pattern not the toy itself ******** the pattern is written in us crochet terms in english materials ---- sport weight yarn or any yarn you have in your stash with appropriate crochet hook size ---- crochet hook size 2 5 mm ---- poly fiber fill for stuffing return policy due to the nature of this listing digital download we don t accept returns and don t refund orders if you have any questions regarding your purchase or pattern please contact us via direct message 1 https //www passionatecrafter com/free-crochet-turkey-gnome-pattern-for-thanksgiving/
